name: get_stations
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool vehicle_charging_stations.
Tool description: Find EV charging stations for cars
You can use this API to retrieve charging location information,
API description: Return nearest charging stations within
A POI (Point of Interest), also referred to as a Site or ChargePoint, is the top-level set of information regarding a geographic site with one or more electric vehicle charging equipment present.

distance.description: The radius in miles to search for charging stations. Defaults to '100'.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate for the search location. Defaults to '2.4379392'.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate for the search location. Defaults to '44.351488'.
